name: 正常的大冒险
summary:
这可能是人类曾经做出来的最正常的游戏
如果你觉得这个游戏好像不太正常
那肯定是你自己不正常
(温馨提醒：也可能是那个愚蠢的开发者不太正常了啦 >_<)

Perhaps this is the most normal game people have ever made
If you think it to be abnomal
The only reason is that you yourself are abnormal
(Or another reason: That stupid game developer is abnormal)
